    • Constructor Detail

      • Boat

        public Boat​(int x,
            int y,
            int maxSpeed,
            int health,
            int stamina,
            float acceleration,
            float maneuverability,
            com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
            java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a boat object.

        Takes a world object to create a box2d body within the world and store relevant characteristics.

        Parameters:
        x - The starting x coordinate
        y - The starting y coordinate
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed of the boat
        health - The boat's health
        stamina - The stamina of the boat
        acceleration - The boat's acceleration
        maneuverability - How quickly the boat can move side to side
        world - The world in which to create the boat
        name - The name of the boat to select
        See Also:
        Player, Opponent

    • Method Detail

      • updateMovement

        public void updateMovement​(int horizontalForce,
                           int verticalForce,
                           float delta)
        Updates the movement properties of the boat.

        The forces take values 1 or 0 typically to represent whether or not a force is being applied.

        Parameters:
        horizontalForce - Whether the boat is undergoing horizontal force (-1 left, 1 right)
        verticalForce - Whether the boat is undergoing vertical force (-1 down, 1 up)
        delta - The delta time between frames

      • inLane

        public boolean inLane()
        Checks if the boat is within its lane.
        Returns:
        true if in lane, false otherwise

      • updateHealth

        public void updateHealth​(int damage)
        Updates the boat's health.

        Subtracts the damage taken from the boat's health and sets broken=true if health less than or equal to 0.

        Parameters:
        damage - The damage to apply

      • updateStamina

        public void updateStamina()
        Updates the boat's stamina based on it's speed.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished​(float timer)
        Checks if the boat has finished the race.

        Compares boat's x position to the position of the finish line.

        Parameters:
        timer - The current leg's time
        Returns:
        true if finished, false otherwise

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the boat to its initial position, stamina and health. Zeros speed.

      • setBroken

        public void setBroken​(boolean broken)
        A setter for objects broken value.
        Parameters:
        broken - The boolean to set broken to

      • isBroken

        public boolean isBroken()
        Check if the boat is broken.
        Returns:
        true if boat is broken, false if otherwise

      • getFastestTime

        public float getFastestTime()
        A getter for the boat's fastest time.
        Returns:
        Float of fastest time

      • resetFastestTime

        public void resetFastestTime()
        Resets the fastest time to 1000f.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        A getter for the name of the boat.
        Returns:
        String of the boat's name
